tool_description: Implement Authentication as well as Encryption at Application Layer in any Desktop, Mobile and Web Assembly Apps using our Suite Of Authentication APIs.

api_list.name: get-sharedkey-forclientapp
api_list.description: Fetch an asymmetric shared key for the Client App based on the Client ID for authorized users and resources.

api_list.name: fetchauthtoken
api_list.description: Fetch the decrypted response that contains the details of the logged in user.

api_list.name: fetchcookieuser
api_list.description: Decrypt the user information contained in a Cookie JWT token.

api_list.name: get-new-securetoken
api_list.description: Fetch a SecureToken for your Client Application, which should be used along with the code challenge for enhanced security.

api_list.name: extendauthtoken
api_list.description: Extend the expiration of the Authorization token by one hour.

api_list.name: get-presharedkey-usingname
api_list.description: Fetch a Shared Key for Destination using Resource Name or Email Address and a UnixTimeStamp.

api_list.name: get-sharedkey-usingname
api_list.description: Fetch a Shared Key for Destination using Resource Name or Email Address.

api_list.name: get-sharedkey-usingtoken
api_list.description: Fetch a Shared Key for Destination using Resource Identity token or Email Identity Token.
